title: Google\Cloud\Translate\V3\BatchTranslateMetadata
name: BatchTranslateMetadata
description:
State metadata for the batch translation operation.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.translation.v3.BatchTranslateMetadata

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.translated_characters
params.description: Number of successfully translated characters so far (Unicode codepoints).

params.name: data.failed_characters
params.description: Number of characters that have failed to process so far (Unicode codepoints).

params.name: data.total_characters
params.description: Total number of characters (Unicode codepoints). This is the total number of codepoints from input files times the number of target languages and appears here shortly after the call is submitted.
